product_name: Black Diamond Distance FL Z-Pole Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The Black Diamond Distance FL Z-Pole trekking poles for women combine a revolutionary folding design with FlickLock Pro adjustability, offering support for backpacking and stream crossings.
